field.name: id
field.comment: Event Page ID

field.name: event_id
field.title: Event
field.comment: Event which this page belongs to.

field.name: intro_text
field.title: Introductory Message
field.comment: Introductory message for Event Registration page. Text and html allowed. Displayed at the top of Event Registration form.

field.name: footer_text
field.title: Footer Message
field.comment: Footer message for Event Registration page. Text and html allowed. Displayed at the bottom of Event Registration form.

field.name: confirm_title
field.title: Confirmation Title
field.comment: Title for Confirmation page.

field.name: confirm_text
field.title: Confirm Text
field.comment: Introductory message for Event Registration page. Text and html allowed. Displayed at the top of Event Registration form.

field.name: confirm_footer_text
field.title: Footer Text
field.comment: Footer message for Event Registration page. Text and html allowed. Displayed at the bottom of Event Registration form.

field.name: is_email_confirm
field.title: Is confirm email
field.comment: If true, confirmation is automatically emailed to contact on successful registration.

field.name: confirm_email_text
field.title: Confirmation Email Text
field.comment: text to include above standard event info on confirmation email. emails are text-only, so do not allow html for now

field.name: confirm_from_name
field.title: Confirm From Name
field.comment: FROM email name used for confirmation emails.

field.name: confirm_from_email
field.title: Confirm From Email
field.comment: FROM email address used for confirmation emails.

field.name: cc_confirm
field.comment: comma-separated list of email addresses to cc each time a confirmation is sent

field.name: bcc_confirm
field.comment: comma-separated list of email addresses to bcc each time a confirmation is sent

field.name: default_fee_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: default_discount_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: thankyou_title
field.title: ThankYou Title
field.comment: Title for ThankYou page.

field.name: thankyou_text
field.title: ThankYou Text
field.comment: ThankYou Text.

field.name: thankyou_footer_text
field.title: Footer Text
field.comment: Footer message.

field.name: is_pay_later
field.comment: if true - allows the user to send payment directly to the org later

field.name: pay_later_text
field.comment: The text displayed to the user in the main form

field.name: pay_later_receipt
field.comment: The receipt sent to the user instead of the normal receipt text

field.name: is_multiple_registrations
field.comment: if true - allows the user to register multiple participants for event
